title: Novavax, AMC, Orphazyme, Corsair Gaming: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Futures suggest the S&P 500 would be muted after the open
body: Novavax shares got a shot in the arm from positive results for its Covid-19 vaccine. Bitcoin took another leg higher over the weekend after Elon Musk again took to Twitter . Here’s what we’re watching as Monday’s trading activity heats up.
